short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Stop guessing and start improving your vocabulary.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Our choice in words define us, so why not expand our selection? With Aptitude words on your side you can search and save a list of words that you have a hard time remembering. Don't spend time you're looking up them up in a dictionary have them with you wherever you go.
